name: Gotta Kill the Box King
description:
In “Gotta Kill the Box King” you play as a little blue box named Charlie. One day they wake up and decide they are going to kill the king… so, that's exactly what you gotta do.

Fight through hordes of enemies with your trusty blaster as you take down each of the king's four knights before he lowers the drawbridge calling for you to challenge him.

With intense combat and a bunch of different enemies and challenging dungeons, you’re sure to have a blast in “Gotta Kill the Box King”

  • Mow down enemies with your trusty blaster
  • Dodge incoming projectiles and speed through dungeons
  • Take on challenging bosses
  • Admire the beautiful visuals of this handcrafted world
  • Defeat the King and become the “hero” of the land

Credits:

MicDoes - Game Designer, Programmer, Artist, Audio creator

Jeremy Korpas - Music - Emergency On Level 3

Godmode - Music - The World's Fair

Bobby Richards - Music - Two Moons

Font - Vividly
